bio.name: Phani Sri Kalidindi
bio.text: I'm a Full Stack Developer driven by a passion for building thoughtful, scalable solutions that blend functionality with clean design. I enjoy turning complex problems into intuitive digital experiences.

about.title: About Me
intro: I'm a Full Stack Developer with 2 years of experience building enterprise-grade web applications that balance performance, scalability, and intuitive design

At Inventiz, I've contributed to internal tools for Walmart â€” including a Supply Chain Management System and a Deduction Management Tool. I worked across the stack, developing robust frontend architectures, integrating REST APIs, and ensuring smooth data flow between services

On the frontend, I specialize in React.js, TypeScript, Redux, and modern UI libraries like Material UI and Kendo UI. My work focuses on responsiveness, maintainability, and performance â€” using techniques like lazy loading, virtual scrolling, and unit testing for long-term reliability

On the backend, I've worked with C#, .NET Core, and SQL, building secure APIs and implementing authentication flows using tools like Auth0. I enjoy working in Agile teams and translating technical goals into real-world impact

card.headerText: Discover my work and see how I turn challenges into impactful web experiences.

tiles.headerText: Developing seamless, responsive websites that deliver.
Writing maintainable, testable code with a focus on long-term reliability.

sections.title: Supply Chain SSO
sections.text: Took ownership of the front-end development for an order optimization tool that managed order flows from  vendor DCs to Walmart stores and  distribution centers. Designed scalable UI components using React.js, TypeScript, and Redux, optimizing performance with lazy loading, virtual scrolling, caching, and versioning. Integrated REST APIs for real-time updates and implemented secure authentication using Auth0. Collaborated with senior developers and the tech lead to shape the project architecture, refine API responses, and ensure a maintainable, high-quality product.

sections.title: Deductions
sections.text: Designed and developed a tool using Tesseract OCR and C# to extract data from scanned PODs, reducing manual effort and improving accuracy. Built a grid-based document management interface with advanced search for efficient upload, retrieval, and management. Created interactive dashboards with charts and KPIs for real-time deduction tracking and insights. Collaborated with the team to ensure seamless development and consistent UI/UX across the application.

sections.title: Full-Stack Training
sections.text: Acquired full-stack development skills in React.js, JavaScript, Redux, Kendo UI, C#, .NET Core, and SQL. Built sample web applications with CRUD operations, UI design, and state management. Gained hands-on experience writing SQL queries and integrating backend services using .NET Core. Applied practical knowledge to deliver end-to-end solutions while demonstrating strong problem-solving skills, adaptability, and effective collaboration.

sections.title: Portfolio Website
sections.text: Developed a responsive personal portfolio using React, TypeScript, and Vite, featuring scroll-triggered animations and active section highlighting. Built with Material-UI following clean architecture principles, the project includes unit testing and Git version control for maintainability. Fully optimized for all screen sizes and devices, it showcases my frontend expertise through structured sections (Home, About, Skills, Experience, Projects) that balance aesthetics with performance and functionality.

sections.title: Clean Architecture Web API
sections.text: Developed a secure and modular ASP.NET Core 8 Web API as part of a learning initiative to understand backend architecture and development practices. The project follows a 3-layer architecture (API, BLL, DAL), integrates JWT-based authentication and role-based authorization, and includes user management and CRUD operations using ADO.NET with SQL Server. Implemented Redis caching to optimize performance and maintained clean code separation with Git for version control.
